page.title: 09TRANSPORT, CALDER VALE
page.content:
BUS SERVICES: On Monday to Friday there is one bus to Garstang each morning for school children, returning in the afternoon.
On Thursday there are two extra buses because it is market day in Garstang.
On Saturday there are three buses to and from Garstang, but none on Sunday
The fare is 70p for adults, and 35p for children; journey time is 25mins.
There aren't many buses because most people have cars and usually give lifts.
A TAXI can also be hired in Calder Vale. This is the minibus which takes children to and from Calder Vale School.
